metadata.Title: CVE-2019-8906 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
do_core_note in readelf.c in libmagic.a in file 5.35 has an out-of-bounds read because memcpy is misused.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-8906` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

file - 1:5.32-2ubuntu0.2
libmagic-mgc - 1:5.32-2ubuntu0.2
libmagic1 - 1:5.32-2ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: file package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:5.32-2ubuntu0.2').
